text: This week i am grateful to <@U38EZFVFE> for his help on a recent project and for being patient in a situation that should have had a better outcome than it had! I am also grateful for the help of <@UD53A9UUR> for helping me with getting CSS Grid up and running on the CMS! Thank you very much!
I am also very grateful for the help of <@UCH1L597V>,who helped me out on several important projects over the course of the last months!
always a pleasure and new learning, working with you <@UBT0AHWLD> so thanks for the opportunities!
